name: Climbing + Push Strength Day
goal: Build upper body pushing strength while maintaining climbing technique and finger strength.
blocks: [{"name":"Warm-up","duration":"15 min","instructions":"Focus on shoulder mobility and activation before loading","exercises":[{"exercise_id":"shoulder_warmup","exercise_name":"Shoulder Warm-up","volume":"5 min","rest":null,"notes":"Include band pull-aparts and arm circles"},{"exercise_id":"handstand_hold","exercise_name":"Handstand Hold","volume":"3x30s","rest":"60s","notes":"Against wall for support"}]},{"name":"Upper Body Strength","duration":"30 min","instructions":"Focus on strict form and controlled movement","exercises":[{"exercise_id":"deep_pike_pushups","exercise_name":"Deep Pike Push-ups","volume":"4x8","rest":"2 min","notes":"Feet elevated on box or chair"},{"exercise_id":"ring_dips","exercise_name":"Ring Dips","volume":"3x6","rest":"2 min","notes":"Scale to box-assisted if needed"},{"exercise_id":"tucked_planche","exercise_name":"Tucked Planche","volume":"5x10s","rest":"90s","notes":"Hold for quality, not just duration"}]},{"name":"Climbing Practice","duration":"30 min","instructions":"Focus on movement quality and efficiency","exercises":[{"exercise_id":"easy_bouldering","exercise_name":"Easy Bouldering","volume":"15 min","rest":null,"notes":"V1-V3 problems, focus on silent feet"}]},{"name":"Core Finisher","duration":"15 min","instructions":null,"exercises":[{"exercise_id":"dragon_flag","exercise_name":"Dragon Flag","volume":"3x5","rest":"90s","notes":"Negative reps if full reps not possible"},{"exercise_id":"l_sit","exercise_name":"L-Sit","volume":"3x20s","rest":"60s","notes":"Tuck knees if needed for progression"}]}]

name: Morning Movement Flow
goal: Gentle full-body activation and mobility for starting the day with energy and focus.
blocks: [{"name":"Activation","duration":"10 min","instructions":"Move slowly and mindfully, listening to your body","exercises":[{"exercise_id":"shoulder_warmup","exercise_name":"Shoulder Warm-up","volume":"5 min","rest":null,"notes":"Include gentle neck rolls and shoulder shrugs"}]}]

name: Upper Body Strength
goal: Build upper body pushing and pulling strength with compound movements
blocks: [{"name":"Warmup","duration":"10 min","instructions":null,"exercises":[{"exercise_id":"warmup_1","exercise_name":"Arm Circles","volume":"2x10","rest":"30s","notes":null},{"exercise_id":"warmup_2","exercise_name":"Shoulder Dislocations","volume":"2x15","rest":"30s","notes":null}]},{"name":"Main Strength","duration":"45 min","instructions":null,"exercises":[{"exercise_id":"bench_press","exercise_name":"Bench Press","volume":"4x6","rest":"3 min","notes":"Focus on controlled tempo"},{"exercise_id":"pull_ups","exercise_name":"Pull-ups","volume":"4x8","rest":"2 min","notes":null},{"exercise_id":"overhead_press","exercise_name":"Overhead Press","volume":"3x8","rest":"2 min","notes":null},{"exercise_id":"rows","exercise_name":"Bent Over Rows","volume":"3x10","rest":"90s","notes":null}]},{"name":"Accessory","duration":"20 min","instructions":null,"exercises":[{"exercise_id":"dips","exercise_name":"Parallel Bar Dips","volume":"3x12","rest":"60s","notes":null},{"exercise_id":"face_pulls","exercise_name":"Face Pulls","volume":"3x15","rest":"45s","notes":null}]}]

name: Climbing Power Session
goal: Develop finger strength and power for climbing performance
blocks: [{"name":"Warmup","duration":"15 min","instructions":null,"exercises":[{"exercise_id":"easy_climbing","exercise_name":"Easy Route Climbing","volume":"10 min","rest":"continuous","notes":null},{"exercise_id":"finger_stretches","exercise_name":"Finger Stretches","volume":"5 min","rest":"continuous","notes":null}]},{"name":"Power Training","duration":"60 min","instructions":null,"exercises":[{"exercise_id":"campus_board","exercise_name":"Campus Board Ladders","volume":"6x3","rest":"5 min","notes":"1-3-5 ladder pattern"},{"exercise_id":"hangboard","exercise_name":"Hangboard Max Hangs","volume":"5x10s","rest":"3 min","notes":null},{"exercise_id":"boulder_problems","exercise_name":"Hard Boulder Problems","volume":"8 attempts","rest":"4 min","notes":"Focus on powerful moves"}]},{"name":"Cool Down","duration":"15 min","instructions":null,"exercises":[{"exercise_id":"easy_traverse","exercise_name":"Easy Traversing","volume":"10 min","rest":"continuous","notes":null},{"exercise_id":"stretching","exercise_name":"Full Body Stretching","volume":"5 min","rest":"continuous","notes":null}]}]

name: Handstand Progression
goal: Build strength and balance for handstands
blocks: [{"name":"Strength and Balance Block","duration":null,"instructions":null,"exercises":[{"exercise_id":"1","exercise_name":"Wall Walks","volume":"3 sets of 5 reps","rest":"1 minute","notes":"Focus on keeping the core tight."},{"exercise_id":"2","exercise_name":"Pike Push-Ups","volume":"3 sets of 8-10 reps","rest":"1 minute","notes":"Ensure proper hand placement and balance."},{"exercise_id":"3","exercise_name":"Handstand Holds against Wall","volume":"4 sets of 20-30 seconds","rest":"1-2 minutes","notes":"Maintain a tight body position."},{"exercise_id":"4","exercise_name":"Shoulder Taps in Handstand Position","volume":"3 sets of 6-8 taps per side","rest":"1 minute","notes":"Control your body and avoid swinging."},{"exercise_id":"5","exercise_name":"Freestanding Handstand Attempts","volume":"10 minutes practice","rest":"n/a","notes":"Try to hold for as long as possible, use a spotter if needed."}]}]

name: Handstand Progression
goal: To hold a handstand for 10 seconds
blocks: [{"name":"Handstand Progression","duration":null,"instructions":null,"exercises":[{"exercise_id":"1","exercise_name":"Wall Walks","volume":"3 sets of 5 reps","rest":"60 seconds","notes":"Focus on getting your feet to the wall and maintaining body alignment."},{"exercise_id":"2","exercise_name":"Handstand Holds Against Wall","volume":"4 sets of 10 seconds","rest":"90 seconds","notes":"Practice kicking up and holding against the wall."},{"exercise_id":"3","exercise_name":"Kick-Ups","volume":"3 sets of 5-10 reps","rest":"60 seconds","notes":"Practice kicking up from a standing position."},{"exercise_id":"4","exercise_name":"Shoulder Taps in Handstand","volume":"3 sets of 5 taps each side","rest":"90 seconds","notes":"If comfortable, practice shoulder taps in a wall-supported handstand."},{"exercise_id":"5","exercise_name":"Core Activation Exercises","volume":"3 sets of 10 reps","rest":"60 seconds","notes":"Include hollow body holds to strengthen core for handstands."}]}]
